## Lease of Portable VHF Radio Sets

### Reference Number

--------------

Request for Proposal

### Closing Date
---------------

### Tender Status
----------------

Expired

### Description
--------------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier to lease Portable VHF Radio Sets to the 3rd Canadian Division (3 Cdn Div). The lease period is expected to be two years and two months, with three one-year option periods. The equipment must be interoperable in a non-secure mode with other military-specific radios in the same frequency band.

### Technical Requirements
-------------------------

*   The equipment must be capable of operating in the VHF frequency band.
*   The equipment must be compatible with other military-specific radios in the same frequency band.
*   The equipment must be capable of operating in a non-secure mode.
